title: Royal Bust
description:
Mottled yellow and gray steatite head of a man from  a statue. Curly hair with plain band or diadem. Face of Hellenistic type with single furrow in forehead, full, slightly open mouth, eyes originally inlaid. Flesh folds indicated on neck.

Condition: Eyes lost. Nose slightly chipped.
section: The Late Period through the Beginning of the Roman Occupation

museum_location.name: 19th Dynasty to Roman Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
